metadata.participant_id: Unique identifier for each survey respondent
metadata.engagement_id: Unique identifier for the survey engagement
metadata.engagement_started_EST: Timestamp when participant started the survey (Eastern Time)
metadata.engagement_completed_EST: Timestamp when participant completed the survey (Eastern Time)
metadata.SurveyName: Name of the survey ('Lunch Combo Question Set')

Q1.question_text: Is a hot dog a sandwich?

variables.Q1: Multiple choice response (Yes/No/It depends/I refuse to answer)
variables.Q1_something_else_video_or_text: Format of additional response if provided
variables.Q1_something_else_video_transcription: Transcription of video response if provided
variables.Q1_something_else_video_sentiment_percen: Confidence score of video sentiment analysis
variables.Q1_something_else_text_sentiment_percent: Confidence score of text sentiment analysis

Q2.question_text: If the bottom of a hot dog bun rips, resulting in two separate pieces of bread containing the sausage, would it now be considered a sandwich?

Q3.question_text: What is the minimum number of ingredients, in addition to bread, required to classify something as a sandwich?

Q4.question_text: Is a taco more likely to be considered a sandwich if it has a hard shell, or soft shell?

variables.Q4: Multiple choice response (Hard/Soft/Only if the bottom cracks or rips/Under no conditions)

Q5.question_text: What is the most important characteristic to consider when deciding whether something is a soup?

variables.Q5: Multiple choice response (The broth/The consistency/The way it's served/The primary flavor profile/Something else)
variables.Q5_something_else_video_transcription: Transcription of video response if provided
variables.Q5_something_else_video_sentiment_percen: Confidence score of video sentiment analysis
variables.Q5_something_else_text_sentiment_percent: Confidence score of text sentiment analysis

Q6.question_text: Is cereal with milk a type of soup?

variables.Q6_something_else_video_or_text: Format of additional response if provided
variables.Q6_something_else_video_transcription: Transcription of video response if provided
variables.Q6_something_else_video_sentiment_percen: Confidence score of video sentiment analysis
variables.Q6_something_else_text_sentiment_percent: Confidence score of text sentiment analysis

Q7.question_text: While sitting in a restaurant, are you more or less likely to order a sandwich from the menu after learning it is an 'open-faced' sandwich?

variables.Q7: Multiple choice response (Much more/A little more/It makes no difference/A little less/Much less)

Q8.question_text: Would you classify a curry as a type of soup, like stew or chowder? Why or why not?

variables.Q8_video_sentiment_percentage: Confidence score of video sentiment analysis
variables.Q8_text_sentiment_percentage: Confidence score of text sentiment analysis

Q9.question_text: If two pieces of pizza are put together crust-sides out, is that a sandwich? Why or why not?

variables.Q9_video_sentiment_percentage: Confidence score of video sentiment analysis
variables.Q9_text_sentiment_percentage: Confidence score of text sentiment analysis

Q10.question_text: To what degree does the intent of the chef matter when classifying foods as soups or sandwiches?

variables.Q10: Scale response (0-5, where 0 = 'Not at all' and 5 = 'It's the only thing that matters')
